column4: I have just installed Ubuntu onto my computer and have not been able to get any sound from the SoundBlaster Live
My CD Player indicates that it is playing the tunes but there is not sound.  The volume is up and not muted.
Everything seems to work with other Linux distributions that I have tried.  I don't think that the CD rom is connected to the audio card
do you get the bongo sounds at the login scrren?
does lsmod give you lots of snd_* modules?
The volume application shows several tabs for the sound card.
There are several modules listed when I use lsmod
could you issue alsamixer in the console?
I don't know what you mean by issue alsamixer?  Could you tell me how to do this.
OK.  I can see the alsamixer app.
are there any MM on top of the master and PCM bars?
There are no MM on top of those two bars.  I have turned up the volumes all the way
hmmm, are you sure you've connected your speakers properly?
otherwise I can't help you I'm afraid...
Yes, I have. Thank you for trying to help.
